summary: Payment scams manipulate victims into sending money to scammers. Some scammers even use generative AI—such as deepfakes—to make scams harder to detect. Payment scams can cause significant financial losses and are a growing problem in the United States. This Q&A report covers the characteristics of payment scams and the role of financial institutions—like banks and payment apps—in preventing, detecting, and recovering from scams. title: Payment Scams: Information on Financial Industry Efforts
